messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/3/02 3:20:46 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... OH THIS IS HYSTERICAL! we are  a single parent/adoptive/bi-racial/ unschooling/ wish we could
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/3/02 3:20:46 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> Of
> > course, dh is thinking all we need is one more thing about our family to
> > have to explain to people, as if being an unschooling, semi-homesteading,
> > mixed race, adoptive family isn't enough.
>
> As Mary Poppins says, "I never explain anything."
>
> :)
> brenda
>
>
>
>

OH THIS IS HYSTERICAL! we are a single parent/adoptive/bi-racial/
unschooling/ "wish we could homestead more" family!~Denise


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
